jbb.engine
Class Avatar

java.lang.Object
  jbb.engine.Tile
      jbb.engine.Avatar
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hero, NPC
public abstract class Avatar
extends Tile

The Abstract Avatar class defines the controllable tile on the board: it is the only one that will be moved. Avatar may pick up items, but not go through walls (generally). The behaviour is further developed in the subclasses Hero and NPC. If an avatar is to die, it is to die upon collision, thus there is no need for hitPoints.

Author:
Jonathan Gravel

getNextPosition

public Position getNextPosition(Position position)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Gets the next position to move to given a position. The position returned will be either up, down, left or right of the avatar.

Parameters:
position - to move to or towards
Returns:
Position calculated
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if move is out of bounds, or if the Avatar will move into a wall.
